entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
